website_summaries.verdict: Another fan favorite from the Oboz community, this hiking boot is recognized for its supreme comfort.
pros: Many buyers appreciate the excellent ankle support these shoes provide
The break-in period for these boots is particularly quick
Many customers noted that they never had issues with blisters
Sizes for both men and women available
cons: A few customers complain that the side fabric of the shoe can rub the ankles

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking shoe and looks good too!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were extremely comfortable from the moment I put them on. I broke them in on a hiking trip down the Grand Canyon. They were light enough for the 9 hour hike down and stiff enough for the challenging boulder slide crossings. The treads are great and even have some spikes for slippery conditions. I wore them on a trail in Colorado that still had snow and in areas where my husband was slipping, my footing was sure. Plus, they are really good looking!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mallery

customer_reviews.title: Love these Oboz
customer_reviews.text: It is really risky for me to buy shoes online without trying them on first, so went to a local shoe store and tried a comparable style in the same brand of shoe. Then, I went ahead and bought these online. I have a very high arch and much prefer to have a wide toe box with a narrow heel. These shoes were perfect. I took them out of the box, walked around in the house for a few hours, then hiked all around Colorado for a week without having any issues at all. Love these Oboz!
customer_reviews.author: Lenee B.

customer_reviews.title: Golf, anyone?
customer_reviews.text: I have some severe ankle issues, and have found these boots to be the perfect spineless golf shoes. They support my ankles and help keep my back foot (on the golf swing) from rotating preventing the knee from twisting outside the ankle. I was fitted as a size 9 to allow for my orthotic. I am amazed at how this has allowed me to play a sport I thought I would have to give up. I can walk without much pain the evening after golf, and have no residual pain the next day. They are worth the price. We only have one pair of feet, you know...
customer_reviews.author: Looie

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable boots I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I've been nothing but pleased with this purchase. The insole fits my foot, with high arches, like it was custom molded for me. I wore these boots new out of the box for a week in Iceland, during which my feet were nothing but comfortable and dry. My feet have stayed dry in puddles and snow, but they were never too hot or sweaty. I haven't had a single blister. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: L. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Walked 40 or so miles in 4 days and my feet felt awesome. My legs after the sand
customer_reviews.text: Bought them because someone else had mentioned they didn't need breaking in and they were so right. Walked 40 or so miles in 4 days and my feet felt awesome. My legs after the sand, not so much ...
customer_reviews.author: Inga

customer_reviews.title: Totally comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I hiked Mt. Fuji in Japan in these! 12+ hours of up and down walking and scambling on the rocks and no blisters! Totally comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M Troiano

customer_reviews.title: ... opportunity to use these as much as I would like, but the few times I've worn them I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Due to an unexpected injury I have not had the opportunity to use these as much as I would like, but the few times I've worn them I've been very happy with the fit and the comfort. When I am recovered fully I will definitely put them to the test and I suspect I will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Olson

customer_reviews.title: Almost 2 years of durabiltiy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots almost two years ago and they are still comfortable and supportive, with great tread. They have seen many types of terrain and weather and are holding up wonderfully. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I like them so far They seem to be sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I had to return them because they were a bit too small in the width. I have a wide toe box. I bought the next size up. I've only worn them once on a short hike, but I like them so far They seem to be sturdy, well made and offer good support.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hiking boots.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hiking boots for my wife and she's using that several times and loves them. And she does recommend them to any female/wife.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love my new hiking boots. Wore them in Colorado and Germany. I have a high arch and need support. These worked. I normally wear a 7 but ordered an 8. My feet tend to swell during long hikes so I like the extra room. I love them so much I am purchasing a low (shoe) version for casual walks with the dogs. Price is a little steep but they are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Corrine T. Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: Great hiking boots! I wore them for the first time on a hiking trip in northern Michigan, I had no trouble breaking them in and had no blisters even after three days of ten mile hikes. The only thing that bothered me was the arch support since I have very high arches, I may have to put my inserts in as I do with most shoes. These boots are waterproof which is great, I stood in the lake with them on and my feet stayed completely dry. wonderful boots so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough and Grippy
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. They're very grippy. I have trouble on small scree on slopes and we get a lot of that in my area. Nothing is perfect on that surface but I feel pretty confident in these on slick small scree slopes.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin C Sabo

customer_reviews.title: Great all weather hiking boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are great hiking boots for all sorts of weather conditions. I have worn them in light snow and in heavy rain and my feet stayed warm and dry. They have good grips on the bottom for hiking in muddy conditions, as well as rocky trails. These are my go to hiking boots!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the ankle support
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking forward to using these for walking dogs in the spring and summer. I've worn them once this winter and were comfortable, but didn't grip very well on ice.
customer_reviews.author: EddieBuck

customer_reviews.title: Size up half size
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots but you need to size up a half size because my regular size is somewhat too small. I have 2 pairs. Low cut and these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My friend had a pair, wore them everyday, hiking in the Tahoe mountains and after 5 years, had to finally but a new pair. Going through tennis shoes every six months, decided it was time to invest for the longer haul. Very comfortable and everything I hoped for. So happy that I purchased this, would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Morby

customer_reviews.title: You could climb to the stars in these
customer_reviews.text: best hiking boot I've ever had. The footbed is super supportive and has exxceeellllennntt traction. Head and shoulders above every other hiking shoe/ boot I've tried. I generally run between a 7 and 7.5, I went for the 7.5 and it's a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking boots.
customer_reviews.text: These fit a little tighter on my right foot than I expected. These are also a little heavier than I expected. They are made well and they look nice. I hate when shoes dent in when you wear them and I don't think these will ever do that. However, that makes them a little stiff, too. All in all, I am satisfied, but still in search of the perfect shoe.
customer_reviews.author: BDavis73

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hiking shoe. It was purchased for my wife. The only thing is, it might not be the best choice on a hot sunny day as the shoe it thick. Even with its ventilation feature its not the most comfortable in very hot climate. Otherwise this is a perfect shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Manu

customer_reviews.title: New love
customer_reviews.text: I use to love Keens and get them every year. But they are not the shoe I used to enjoy. I think I have found my new shoe love.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L. Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Best Hiking Boots I've Ever Had!
customer_reviews.text: I'm now on my second pair of these, having finally worn out my first pair after 2+ years of hard use. This is the only pair of boots I've ever had that required almost no breaking in - in fact, the first time I wore them I did a moderately tough hike across the Alaskan tundra and down some steep cinder slopes, and had no blisters or discomfort to show for it. They did not remain waterproof past the first few months, but that's my only complaint. Buy these, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very fair price and comfortable. Ended up buying 2 pairs of these. A comfortable, sturdy summer weight hiking boot.
customer_reviews.author: Sustainability

customer_reviews.title: These boots are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these boots since February of this year and they are AMAZING. I wore them around quite a bit before hiking in them, and the first time I wore them on a hike, they didn’t hurt at all! They’re extremely durable, sturdy, and waterproof. I’ll wear them if it’s snowing, raining, or just doing some random yard work.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lopez

customer_reviews.title: So painful to wear in the ankle, soles of my feel, and top
customer_reviews.text: Used the boots twice for my trails. Never again will I purchase anything like this. I even bought insoles thinking that would help. I'd rather walk the gravel trails barefoot. It would be less painful.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia & Nehemiah Minor

customer_reviews.title: fit great, feet dry
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them, fit great, feet dry, look great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hiking boot. A little bit soft on ankle support for difficult terrain , but very comfortable for easy to moderate terrain. Traction is excellent both uphill and down. I would highly recommend this boot.
customer_reviews.author: G. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and feels good on my foot
customer_reviews.text: Well made, quality hiking boot. Fits great and feels good on my foot. I liked them so much I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: gayle bryan

customer_reviews.title: great hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: Light weight ,very well made and super comfortable .. excellent Hiking boot ! very pleased and will buy this brand again ..
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Love them. This awesome shoes double as winter shoes for walking on snow, and icy areas.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love those hiking boots. I got them before a 17 mile hike and didn’t have too much time to break them in. No blisters! Very comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I love these so much! I had no idea how much different my hikes would be with the proper shoes. Absolutely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Morgan

customer_reviews.title: They fit a little tight around my ankles but I need the ankle support so they're great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Oboz and my first mid-rise hikers. They fit a little tight around my ankles but I need the ankle support so they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Ritaonwii

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Overall this hiking boot was very good quality. It seemed to be substantial without being too heavy. The support was very good, and the tread was more than adequate. One note, if your foot is even a little beyond narrow, these will be a tight fit. My wife normally wears a size 7. I bought a half size bigger to accomdate heavier socks, however it was just too narrow ( and she doesn't have "wide" feet. I Believe, like in most shoes, they all have their own "fit". These did not work for her. Still, quality shoe and reasonable price if it fits. So, go for it Cinderella, try that thing on!
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hikers! Worn in the cold and in the heat. Great for all hiking and trail walking purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they were comfortable from my first hike in them which included 500 ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting to have a "break in" period but there was none, they were comfortable from my first hike in them which included 500 feet in elevation change and over 5 miles of wooded trail.
customer_reviews.author: VickiLee

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, went to Lake Tahoe, skied in these boots, excellent quality, stayed dry and very comfy after broke in, these boots are made for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these!
customer_reviews.text: So immediately comfortable! Look Cute on! Sturdy and stable on the trail. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE/GOOD SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: I AM NOT USUALLY FOND OF BOOTS THAT HIT MY ANKLE, BUT THESE BOOTS ARE VERY COMFORTABLE. I AM NEW TO HIKING AND HOPE TO WEAR THEM FOR MANY TREKS!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D. Hebel

customer_reviews.title: Best hiking investment ever
customer_reviews.text: So impressed! Bought them just before a backpacking trip and they just fit perfectly! They really required no breaking in. I hiked through snow, water, and dirt and they really met each task! Best hiking investment ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... ankle on the side and back and it hurts pretty bad. I cannot wear it at all
customer_reviews.text: It rubs my ankle on the side and back and it hurts pretty bad. I cannot wear it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Liping Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box. Waterproof, but in my area (tropical) they can tend to get hot. Price you pay for the waterproofing.
customer_reviews.author: C Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great product...slow to break in.
customer_reviews.text: Have been a buyer of Oboz boots for years and have always loved them! This pair, however, took some more time to break in to be comfortable than boots of my past. I got blisters the first time wearing them and the first couple of times my feet hurt pretty good after only wearing them for a couple of hours. I feel them breaking in more now that I'm on my fifth hike with them. Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: They were very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Hiked a full week in Glacier National Park. They were very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: My second pair, my favorite boots
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after having worn out a previous pair that I had bought offline. They run wide, which is fantastic, they're comfortable, they're completely waterproof. I wore my last pair until I had worn the soles off the shoes- all day, every day, for almost three years. And when I finally decided it was time for new shoes, there was no way I was buying any other boot. The only negative thing about them is that the shoelaces get worn through easily just from tying them. But since new laces are cheap, I didn't consider that a big deal. The ones I wore out are actually still waterproof, even though they are slick-soled and worn down to the nub.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: New Hiker
customer_reviews.text: I am a new hiker and bought these to break them in before a trip to AT. I got a blister on small toe and the top rubs a place in irritating way. Wonder if i just need to break them in, or if they will continue to be ill fitting?
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bates

customer_reviews.title: run a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8.5 I ended up with a size 9 which I am really happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Nonni

customer_reviews.title: Good alrounder
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, comfortable and good value. My feet did get a little damp walking in long wet grass for 20 minutes which I was surprised at since they are pretty new, but otherwise happy with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Bern

customer_reviews.title: Works for my hiking
customer_reviews.text: It's not the boots. It's my own toes - one foot a 8 and other 8.5 and needed 9.0 or 9.5 for room with my thick socks to hike. The 9.5 was much better as the 9.0 got too snug.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya G Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, sturdy yet flexible.  Hiked the Grand Canyon with my shoe orthodic inserts inside.  Made all the difference!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because they would require little break in time and they are large enough to allow my shoe inserts to fit and give my toes plenty of room to wiggle and not bump up against the front of the boot when hiking down hill. They are very sturdy and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Super chunky looking. I sent them back. They fit though, I ordered my actual shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Duff

product_meta.title: Oboz Women's Sawtooth Mid BDRY Hiking Boot
